title: Moto G200 picks up stable Android 12 update
content:
After rolling out a stable Android 12 update to the Moto Edge 20 last week, Motorola is expanding the latest version of Android to one more phone in its portfolio: the Moto G200. Motorola has started seeding a stable Android 12 update to the Moto G200 in select markets. The update carries firmware version S1RX32.50-13

The post Moto G200 picks up stable Android 12 update appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Motorola has started seeding a stable Android 12 update to the Moto G200 in select markets. The update carries firmware version S1RX32.50-13.
